modName: Armor of the Righteous Path replacer - DELETED
summary: Replaces the Ebony armor model used as the Righteous Path armor.
descriptionHtml:
T[b]he Ebony armor used as the Righteous Path armor in Enderal is replaced with a different one using the Witcher 2 models.Please report any issues in the forum.


[color=#ffff00][u]Recommended[color=#93c47d]:[/color][/u][/color][color=#93c47d][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82489/?]Weapons of the Righteous path replacer[/url][/color] .But load this mod [color=#00ffff]after[/color] the Righteous weapons replacer or the cuirass and gauntlets will be invisible!


[color=#ffff00][u]New:[/u] [/color]Version 2.0 that contains a fix for the "massive rampant" shield's ground model that was missing in previous versions and uses only the thin male armor models for the female PC which is more proper for the female form in every size.


[u][color=#ffff00]Issues.[/color][/u]If you have installed my Calia overhaul take 2 mod,load it before the Righteous Path armor replacer or the Righteous and gauntlets cuirass will be invisible.If you use the Righteous Path weapons replacer,also load it before this mod.



[u]Credits:[/u]

[color=#00ffff][color=#93c47d]LordOfWar[/color] [/color]for the Witcher 2 models.

[color=#93c47d]Abacus [/color]for the heater shield.

[color=#93c47d]defunkt [/color]for the [/b][b]Dawnguard Full Helmet without insignia.[/b]
[b]

[u]Tools used[/u]

[color=#93c47d]Gimp

Nifscope

Skyrim creation kit.[/color][/b]
author: Medtech
